name: Play Guitar
description: A comprehensive plan to learn and start playing the guitar, from choosing an instrument to playing your first song.

name: Project: Make Something
description: A structured approach to bring a creative idea to life, from initial concept to final evaluation. This plan guides you through the essential steps to design, create, and refine your chosen 'something'.

name: C# Learning Journey
description: A structured plan to learn C# from foundational concepts to advanced topics and practical application, ensuring a solid understanding and skill development.

name: Learn Java Programming
description: A comprehensive, chronological plan to learn Java from fundamental concepts to building practical applications.
